story:
--SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH TEXT--

La Storia

Un anno fa, in "Brothel Bros", i 10 peggiori pervertiti della città scoprirono che il loro bordello preferito era in realtà gestito da demoni. Il Direttore, capo dei demoni, scagliò su di loro una maledizione che li avrebbe uccisi se avessero rivelato a qualcuno la loro scoperta. Passarono una notte letteralmente infernale e alcuni di loro, collaborando (più o meno), sono riusciti a sopravvivere. [Leggi le anteprime su facebook.]

Ma ora, in "Brothel Bros 2 - Piano B", la pace che ottennero combattendo è minacciata. Quando si riuniscono tutti per una cerimonia nuziale, alcuni imbucati davvero diabolici rovinano tutto orribilmente spedendo metà dei partecipanti del matrimonio in un altro piano dimensionale. Nel cercare di riportare ognuno alla propria realtà di appartenenza scopriranno che qualcosa di molto più grosso sta per succedere... [Leggi le anteprime su facebook.]

Il Progetto

Brothel Bros è una commedia thriller che usa la sua folle e assurda premessa per raccontare una storia divertente e adrenalinica, ma anche per toccare alcuni temi più profondi e psicologici come i feticci sessuali e la pedofilia in maniera diretta e onesta. Il primo volume è stato ricevuto positivamente in Italia ed ha anche ricevuto due premi all'Italian Indie Comics Award nel 2016. Brothel Bros 2 prosegue nelle stesse orme avendo una storia ancor più avventurosa e tuffandosi ancora più in profondità nelle menti dei personaggi. Brothel Bros ha in passato portato le persone a discutere dei sé stessi interiori e desidera farlo ancora, perché raccontare storie avvincenti che ti rimangano addosso è la cosa migliore che possiamo ambire a fare.

La squadra di BB2

David Malan è lo sceneggiatore e ha creato Brothel Bros assieme a Sara Antonellini che ricopre anche i ruoli di editor e colorista, e come aiuto colorista c'è Giulia D'Urso. Ai disegni ci sono Beatrice Bovo, Silvia Belli, Lisa Picchietti, Connie Daidone, e Giulia Lomurno. A disegnare e colorare le proprie tavole ci sono Stefano Martinuz e Milena Ciccarello. A realizzare la copertina c'è Elisa Serio. A realizzare i design delle T-Shirt e i Mini-Poster e ad aver disegnato nel primo volume c'è Eleonora Bruni.

Brothel Bros e Brothel Bros 2 sono fumetti indipendenti autoprodotti distribuiti alle fiere del fumetto in Italia dal gruppo no-profit "Potpourri Comics". Col tuo aiuto saremo in grado di completare BB2 e tradurre e stampare in inglese entrambi i fumetti (BB1 è stato già tradotto, BB2 lo sarà presto).

Lavori in corso

Brothel Bros 1 è completamente finito ed è tradotto in ingese per circa il 65%, ma la traduzione riprenderà non appena finirà questa campagna (richiede fatica, sai?). Brothel Bros 2 è completamente sceneggiato ed è disegnato per circa il 50%, ma il lavoro procede speditamente e siamo tutti professionisti che hanno lavorato a progetti simili in passato. Perciò amenoché dei demoni non emergano dal terreno per portarci nel loro piano dimensionale (il che, è vero, Brothel Bros implica che sia più probabile di quel che sembra), finiremo il nuovo volume entro le scadenze che ci siamo severamente imposti, e tutti i perk verranno spediti.

I Prodotti

C'è un sacco di roba figa qui, e gran parte è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding e/o è nuova.

  • Brothel Bros 1 è la versione cartacea, e la sua versione in inglese è nuova. Scopri come ottenere questo prodotto cliccando qui.

  • Brothel Bros 2 è la versione cartacea ed è il fumetto sul quale stiamo lavorando proprio ora, quindi è super nuovo!

  • Mini Poster - Team Ludo/Team Iancu è un piccolo poster formato cartolina con un design di Team Ludo da un lato e uno di Team Iancu sull'altro. È un'esclusiva del crowdfunding e verrà data gratuitamente assieme ad ogni copia cartacea di Brothel Bros 2  come ringraziamento speciale ai contributori!

  • Brothel Bros 1 - File PDF è l'edizione digitale di Brothel Bros 1  ed è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding. Contiene tutto ciò ch'è presente nell'edizione cartacea.
  • Brothel Bros 2 - File PDF è l'edizione digitale di Brothel Bros 2  ed è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding. Contiene tutto ciò ch'è presente nell'edizione cartacea.
  • Brothel Bros Backstage Book è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è un albetto contenente sketch e studi dei personaggi dei disegnatori. Contiene anche alcune curiosità sul processo creativo e alcune informazioni sul dietro-le-quinte riguardo la storia e i personaggi di Brothel Bros.

  • Commissione Personalizzata ti permetterà di scegliere due personaggi di Brothel Bros che verranno disegnati da uno dei disegnatori a tua scelta a colori in digitale solo per te!
  • Brothel Bros 2 T-Shirt è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è un T-Shirt con un design di Team Iancu o di Team Ludo , la scelta è tua! Potrai anche scegliere taglia e colore.

  • [NOVITA'] BodyPillow-Case è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è una federa per Dakimakura (cuscinone da circa 50x150cm). Potete scegliere 2 dei 6 design disponibili da applicare sul fronte e sul retro della federa per portarvi a letto chi preferite tra Iancu, Shabriri, e Ludo.

  • [NOVITA'] BodyPillow è il cuscino sul quale potete usare la federa BodyPillow-Case.

Stretch Goals

[NOVITA'] Possiamo ora annunciare il nostro Stretch Goal! Se raggiungeremo 3500€, chiunque di voi abbia ordinato un Perk fisico, otterrà un Preservativo Personalizzato di Brothel Bros!!! Volete avere una protezione speciale per qualcuno di speciale? Beh, ecco qua! Aiutaci a raggiungere lo Stetch Goal a l'avrai!

Caccia i soldi

I fondi raccolti in questa campagna saranno usati per pagare la stampa e la spedizione dei prodotti e il restante è destinato agli artisti i cui meravigliosi talenti hanno forgiato questo magnifico libro. David e Sara, i creatori e sviluppatori di Brothel Bros, hanno deciso di non ricevere alcuna percentuale da ciò che verrà raccolto qui, per permettere invece al resto del team creativo di cominciare a guadagnare prima di loro. Perché ti diciamo questo? Non sono affari loro cosa decidono di fare? Beh, più o meno. Vogliamo che tu sappia che il tuo contributo andrà tanto direttamente quanto possibile nelle mani che hanno realizzato le tavole che stai ammirando, perché un lavoro ben fatto va pagato, perdindirindina! (E perché anche gli artisti devono mangiare!)

Quindi, secondo i nostri calcoli, questo è all'incirca come verranno impiegati i fondi:

  • 10% Tariffa Indiegogo e tasse
  • 50% Stampa e spedizione prodotti
  • 40% Team creativo

Speriamo davvero di sì, ma questo non significa necessariamente che tu te lo possa permettere. Abbiamo reso i fumetti disponibili anche in forma digitale, come alternativa più ecologica e più economica, ma se anche questo fosse fuori portata per te, puoi sempre aiutarci condividendo questa campagna con gente che pensi possa essere interessata! Vogliamo portare Brothel Bros al mondo intero, ma le nostre braccia non sono abbastanza lunghe, né i nostri polmoni sono abbastanza potenti, quindi più siamo, meglio è!

... o nel peggiore dei casi possiamo fingere di averne. Ecco le risposte ad alcune domande che potresti avere. Se la tua domanda non è elencata qui, congratulazioni, sei speciale (in senso buono, si spera) e puoi contattarci cliccando su "Ask a question" in alto a destra nella pagina accanto alla faccia diabolicamente sexy di David!

I fumetti sono in Inglese o in Italiano?

Entrambi! Quando richiedi un perk, ti verrà chiesto di scegliere in quale lingua vuoi che sia il fumetto, e questo vale sia per Brothel Bros 1 che per Brothel Bros 2, sia per l'edizione cartacea che per quella digitale. Per il Brothel Bros Backstage Book non ti verrà chiesto di scegliere, perché ogni copia è bilingue (ha entrambe le lingue).

E se io non avessi letto Brothel Bros 1?

Non preoccuparti! Ti suggeriamo di prendere il perk "Both Books" o il perk "Digital Duo" così da avere sia BB1 che BB2! Ma se intendevi prendere alcuni dei prodotti esclusivi del crowfunding, o se intendevi prendere solo il primo libro (Puoi farlo! Tecnicamente BB1 è una storia completa, quindi puoi anche leggere solo quello!) allora clicca qui.

Nota: i perk con "Add-On" nel nome non possono essere richiesti da soli e non se ne può richiedere più di uno per una singola spedizione.

Posso ritirare di persona il perk e non pagare la spedizione?

Se hai richiesto il perk "Brothel Bros 2 - in fiera" ritirerai il perk a Lucca Comics and Games 2018 (ti verranno forniti informazioni e aggiornamenti via e-mail). Se hai richiesto un qualsiasi altro perk e vuoi ritirarlo di persona ti chiediamo di pagare comunque la spedizione (per l'Italia parte da soli 2€), ma di contattarci subito dopo. Se riusciremo, ti daremo il perk di persona (e potresti ottenere qualcosa in più gratuitamente per ricompensarti del disturbo) altrimenti ti avvertiremo per tempo e procederemo comunque con la spedizione.

Che tipo di spedizione è prevista?

Se richiedi un perk che necessita di spedizione, ti verrà chiesto di fornire un indirizzo e ti verrà aggiunto un costo di spedizione dipendente dalla nazione destinataria. Il tuo ordine verrà spedito tramite Poste Italiane usando un pacco normale non tracciabile e non raccomandato (per tenere bassi i costi di spedizione). Per le spedizioni in Italia, per i perk contenenti T-Shirt sarà un "Pacco Ordinario", per tutti gli altri sarà un "Piego di Libri". Se vuoi una Spedizione Raccomandata (che richiederà la tua firma per essere consegnata) clicca qui o contattaci cliccando su "Ask a question"  in alto a destra nella pagina, accanto alla faccia straordinariamente seducente di David!

Nota: i perk i cui nomi contengolo la parola "Extra" non possono essere richiesti da soli e non se ne può richiedere più di uno per una singola spedizione. Indipendentemente dal tipo di spedizione che scegli, noi non saremo responsabili del tuo pacco qualora questo andasse danneggiato o perso durante la spedizione.

In quali taglie e colori sono disponibili le T-Shirt?

Le T-Shirt saranno disponibili in Nero, Grigio, e Bianco, quindi avranno un aspetto simile a questo:

E per sapere quant'è piccola una S, quant'è larga una L, e quant'è... media una M, dai un'occhiata a questa utile tabella! Ti suggeriamo di misurare una maglietta che ti sta comoda e di prendere la taglia che ci si avvicina di più.

Avete una macchina del tempo?

Sfortunatamente no, ma se vi riferite al perk "PROMO PACK" che indica come data di spedizione del perk "novembre 2011", beh... è un errore. E se l'avete ordinato dovreste saperlo. Dovreste saperlo da quasi 7 anni!

 

 

Grazie di aver visitato, contribuito, e condiviso!

 

 

 

 

The Story

A year ago, in “Brothel Bros”, the city's 10 worst perverts found out their favourite brothel was actually run by demons. The Administrator, chief of the demons, cast a curse on them, so that if they told someone about their discovery, they'd die. They quite literally had a hell of a night and some of them managed to somewhat cooperate and live to tell the tale (which they didn't, for obvious reasons). [Read the Preview on Tapas, Facebook, Instagram, or Tumblr.]
But now, in “Brothel Bros 2 – Plan B”, the peace they fought to defend is threatened. When they all reunite for a wedding ceremony, some really devilish wedding crashers make everything go horribly wrong by sending half of the ceremony guests into another dimensional plane. As they try to get everyone back to their own reality they'll find out there's something way bigger going on...

The Project

Brothel Bros is a comedic thriller comic that uses its wacky absurd premise to tell a funny adrenaline-fueled story, but also to touch upon some deeper psychological topics such as sexual kinks and paedophilia in a bluntly honest way. The first book was positively recieved in Italy and also won two awards at the Italian Indie Comics Award in 2016. Brothel Bros 2 follows in the same footsteps by having an even more adventurous story and delving even deeper into the characters' minds. Brothel Bros has brought people to discuss their inner selves in the past and desires to do it again, because telling compelling stories that stick with you is the best thing we can aim to do.

The BB2 Team

David Malan is the writer and he created Brothel Bros together with Sara Antonellini who also fills the roles of editor and colorist, and as a colorist aide there's Giulia D'Urso. Beatrice Bovo, Silvia Belli, Lisa Picchietti, Connie Daidone, and Giulia Lomurno are in charge of the drawings. Stefano Martinuz and Milena Ciccarello draw and color their own pages. Elisa Serio is in charge of the cover. And in addition to drawing part of BB1, Eleonora Bruni is in charge of the T-Shirts and Mini-Posters designs.

Brothel Bros and Brothel Bros 2 are self-published indie comics distributed in Italian comicbook conventions with the help of non-profit group "Potpourri Comics". With your help we'll be able to complete BB2 and to translate and print both comics in english (BB1 has been translated, BB2 will be shortly).

Work in progess

Brothel Bros 1 is completely finished and about 65% translated into English, but translating will resume as soon as this campaign is over (it's quite tolling, y'know?). Brothel Bros 2 is completely written and about 50% drawn, but work is proceding steadily and all of us are professionals and worked on similar projects before. So unless demons sprout out of the ground and take us to their dimensional plane (which, granted, Brothel Bros implies it's more likely than it sounds), we will finish the new book within the deadlines we very strictly wrote for ourselves, and all the perks will be then shipped.

The Items

There's lots of awesome stuff here, and most of it is a crowdfunding exclusive and/or new.

  • Brothel Bros 1 is the paperback edition and its English version is new. Find out how to get this item by clicking here.

  • Brothel Bros 2 is the paperback edition and is the comic we're working on right now, so it's extra new!

  • Mini Poster - Team Ludo/Team Iancu is a small postcard-like poster with a Team Ludo design on one side and a Team Iancu design on the other. It's a crowdfunding exclusive and will be given free with every paperback copy of Brothel Bros 2  as a special thank you to the contributors!

  • Brothel Bros 1 - File PDF is the digital edition of Brothel Bros 1 and is a crowdfunding exclusive. It contains everything made available in the paperback edition.
  • Brothel Bros 2 - File PDF is the digital edition of Brothel Bros 2 and is a crowdfunding exclusive. It contains everything made available in the paperback edition.
  • Brothel Bros Backstage Book is a crowdfunding exclusive booklet containing sketches and character studies from the artists. It also contains some trivia about the creative process and some behind-the-scenes information about the story and characters of Brothel Bros.

  • Commissione Personalizzata grants you a custom made commission from one of the artists. You get to choose two Brothel Bros characters and the artist you chose will draw them in a full color digital picture just for you!
  • Brothel Bros 2 T-Shirt is a crowdfunding exclusive T-Shirt with either a Team Iancu or a Team Ludo design on it, your choice! You'll also get to choose its size and color.

  • [NEW] BodyPillow-Case it's a crowdfunding exclusive and it's a  Dakimakura pillowcase (measuring around 50x150cm). You can choose 2 of the 6 available designs to use as the front and the back of the pillow-case, so you may choose who you'd rather sleep with: Iancu, Shabriri, or Buck.

  • [NEW] BodyPillow is the pillow you can use the BodyPillow-Case with.

Stretch Goals

[NEW] We can now announce our stretch goal! If we reach 3500€ all the backers who bought physical Perks will get a Brothel Bros Custom Condom!!! You wanna have a special condom for a special someone? Well, here ya go! Help us reach the Stretch Goal and you'll have it!

Show me the money

The funds raised in this campaign will be used to pay the printing and shipping of the items and the rest is set to go to the artists whose amazing talents forged this magnificent book. David and Sara, the creators and developers of Brothel Bros, decided not to get a cut of what will be raised here, to instead allow the rest of the creative team to start earning before them. Why do we tell you this? Isn't it their own business what they decide to do? Well, sorta. We want you to know that your contribution will go as directly as possible to pay the hands that made the art that you're seeing, because a good job deserves to be paid, gosh darn it! (And because artists need to eat too!)

So, according to our calculations this should approximately be how the funds will be employed:

  • 10% Indiegogo fee and taxes
  • 50% Perks printing and shipping costs
  • 40% Creative team

We really hope you do, but that doesn't necessarily mean you can afford it. We made the comics available in digital form too, as a greener and cheaper alternative, but if that's still too much for you, you can still help us out by sharing this campaign with people who you think might be interested! We want to bring Brothel Bros to the world, but our arms aren't that long and our lungs aren't that powerful, so the more we are spreading the word, the better!

... or at least we'll pretend we do. Here are the answers to some questions you might have. If your question is not listed here, congratulations, you are special (in a good way, we hope) and you can contact us by clicking on "Ask a question" on the top right of the page, next to David's devilishly sexy face!

Are the comics in English or in Italian?

Both! When you claim a perk, you'll be asked to choose what language you want the comic to be in, this goes for both Brothel Bros 1 and Brothel Bros 2, both paperback and digital. For the Brothel Bros Backstage Book you won't be asked to choose, as every copy of it is bilingual (with both languages).

What if I haven't read Brothel Bros 1?

No worries! We suggest getting the perks "Both Books" or "Digital Duo" so that you'll have both BB1 and BB2! But if you wanted to get some of the crowdfunding exclusive items too, or if you wanted to get just the first book (You can do that! Technically BB1 is a complete story, so you can read it on it's own!) then click here.

Note: perks with "Add-On" in their name can't be claimed singularly and you can't claim more than one of them in the same shipping.

Can I collect my perk in person, and not pay for shipping?

If you claimed the perk "Brothel Bros 2 - in fiera" you will collect your perk at Lucca Comics and Games 2018 (instructions and updates will be provided to you via e-mail). If you claimed any other perk and want to collect it in person, we ask you to still pay for shipping, but to contact us afterwards. If we'll be able to, we'll give you the perk in person (and you might get something extra for your trouble) otherwise we'll tell you so beforehand and we'll ship the perk.

What kind of shipping do I get?

If you claim a perk that requires shipping, you'll be asked to fill out your address and a shipping fee will be added depending on the country you're ordering from. Your order will be sent via Poste Italiane (Italy's mail service) using regular non-trackable unregistered packages (to keep your shipping fees low). If you want to get Registered Shipping (which will require your signature to be delivered) click here or contact us by clicking on "Ask a question" on the top right of the page, next to David's amazingly seductive face!

Note: perks with "Extra" in their name can't be claimed singularly and you can't claim more than one of them in the same shipping. Regardless of the shipping option you choose, we will not be responsible for your package being lost or damaged during shipping,

What are the T-Shirts sizes and colors?

The Shirts come in Black, Grey (Charcoal), and White, so they'll look something like this:

And to know how small a small is, how large a large is, and how... medium a medium is, check out this helpful chart! We suggest you measure a T-Shirt you are comfortable in, and then get the closest size.

Do you have a freaking time machine?

Unfortunatley not, but if you're refering to the "PROMO PACK" perk showing "november 2011" as a shipping estimated time, wel... it's a typo. And you should know that, if you ordered it. You should've known that for almost 7 years!

 

Thanks for visiting, contributing, and sharing!

Il Direttore, capo dei demoni, scagliò su di loro una maledizione che li avrebbe uccisi se avessero rivelato a qualcuno la loro scoperta. Passarono una notte letteralmente infernale e alcuni di loro, collaborando (più o meno), sono riusciti a sopravvivere. [Leggi le anteprime su facebook.]
Ma ora, in "Brothel Bros 2 - Piano B", la pace che ottennero combattendo è minacciata. Quando si riuniscono tutti per una cerimonia nuziale, alcuni imbucati davvero diabolici rovinano tutto orribilmente spedendo metà dei partecipanti del matrimonio in un altro piano dimensionale. Nel cercare di riportare ognuno alla propria realtà di appartenenza scopriranno che qualcosa di molto più grosso sta per succedere... [Leggi le anteprime su facebook.]
Il Progetto
Brothel Bros è una commedia thriller che usa la sua folle e assurda premessa per raccontare una storia divertente e adrenalinica, ma anche per toccare alcuni temi più profondi e psicologici come i feticci sessuali e la pedofilia in maniera diretta e onesta. Il primo volume è stato ricevuto positivamente in Italia ed ha anche ricevuto due premi all'Italian Indie Comics Award nel 2016. Brothel Bros 2 prosegue nelle stesse orme avendo una storia ancor più avventurosa e tuffandosi ancora più in profondità nelle menti dei personaggi. Brothel Bros ha in passato portato le persone a discutere dei sé stessi interiori e desidera farlo ancora, perché raccontare storie avvincenti che ti rimangano addosso è la cosa migliore che possiamo ambire a fare.
La squadra di BB2

David Malan è lo sceneggiatore e ha creato Brothel Bros assieme a Sara Antonellini che ricopre anche i ruoli di editor e colorista, e come aiuto colorista c'è Giulia D'Urso. Ai disegni ci sono Beatrice Bovo, Silvia Belli, Lisa Picchietti, Connie Daidone, e Giulia Lomurno. A disegnare e colorare le proprie tavole ci sono Stefano Martinuz e Milena Ciccarello. A realizzare la copertina c'è Elisa Serio. A realizzare i design delle T-Shirt e i Mini-Poster e ad aver disegnato nel primo volume c'è Eleonora Bruni.
Brothel Bros e Brothel Bros 2 sono fumetti indipendenti autoprodotti distribuiti alle fiere del fumetto in Italia dal gruppo no-profit "Potpourri Comics". Col tuo aiuto saremo in grado di completare BB2 e tradurre e stampare in inglese entrambi i fumetti (BB1 è stato già tradotto, BB2 lo sarà presto).Lavori in corsoBrothel Bros 1 è completamente finito ed è tradotto in ingese per circa il 65%, ma la traduzione riprenderà non appena finirà questa campagna (richiede fatica, sai?). Brothel Bros 2 è completamente sceneggiato ed è disegnato per circa il 50%, ma il lavoro procede speditamente e siamo tutti professionisti che hanno lavorato a progetti simili in passato. Perciò amenoché dei demoni non emergano dal terreno per portarci nel loro piano dimensionale (il che, è vero, Brothel Bros implica che sia più probabile di quel che sembra), finiremo il nuovo volume entro le scadenze che ci siamo severamente imposti, e tutti i perk verranno spediti.I ProdottiC'è un sacco di roba figa qui, e gran parte è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding e/o è nuova.
Brothel Bros 1 è la versione cartacea, e la sua versione in inglese è nuova. Scopri come ottenere questo prodotto cliccando qui.

Brothel Bros 2 è la versione cartacea ed è il fumetto sul quale stiamo lavorando proprio ora, quindi è super nuovo!

Mini Poster - Team Ludo/Team Iancu è un piccolo poster formato cartolina con un design di Team Ludo da un lato e uno di Team Iancu sull'altro. È un'esclusiva del crowdfunding e verrà data gratuitamente assieme ad ogni copia cartacea di Brothel Bros 2  come ringraziamento speciale ai contributori!

Brothel Bros 1 - File PDF è l'edizione digitale di Brothel Bros 1  ed è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding. Contiene tutto ciò ch'è presente nell'edizione cartacea.

Brothel Bros 2 - File PDF è l'edizione digitale di Brothel Bros 2  ed è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding. Contiene tutto ciò ch'è presente nell'edizione cartacea.

Brothel Bros Backstage Book è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è un albetto contenente sketch e studi dei personaggi dei disegnatori. Contiene anche alcune curiosità sul processo creativo e alcune informazioni sul dietro-le-quinte riguardo la storia e i personaggi di Brothel Bros.


Commissione Personalizzata ti permetterà di scegliere due personaggi di Brothel Bros che verranno disegnati da uno dei disegnatori a tua scelta a colori in digitale solo per te!

Brothel Bros 2 T-Shirt è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è un T-Shirt con un design di Team Iancu o di Team Ludo , la scelta è tua! Potrai anche scegliere taglia e colore.

[NOVITA'] BodyPillow-Case  è un'esclusiva del crowdfunding ed è una federa per Dakimakura (cuscinone da circa 50x150cm). Potete scegliere 2 dei 6 design disponibili da applicare sul fronte e sul retro della federa per portarvi a letto chi preferite tra Iancu, Shabriri, e Ludo.
[NOVITA'] BodyPillow è il cuscino sul quale potete usare la federa BodyPillow-Case.Stretch Goals[NOVITA'] Possiamo ora annunciare il nostro Stretch Goal! Se raggiungeremo 3500€, chiunque di voi abbia ordinato un Perk fisico, otterrà un Preservativo Personalizzato di Brothel Bros!!! Volete avere una protezione speciale per qualcuno di speciale? Beh, ecco qua! Aiutaci a raggiungere lo Stetch Goal a l'avrai!Caccia i soldiI fondi raccolti in questa campagna saranno usati per pagare la stampa e la spedizione dei prodotti e il restante è destinato agli artisti i cui meravigliosi talenti hanno forgiato questo magnifico libro. David e Sara, i creatori e sviluppatori di Brothel Bros, hanno deciso di non ricevere alcuna percentuale da ciò che verrà raccolto qui, per permettere invece al resto del team creativo di cominciare a guadagnare prima di loro. Perché ti diciamo questo? Non sono affari loro cosa decidono di fare? Beh, più o meno. Vogliamo che tu sappia che il tuo contributo andrà tanto direttamente quanto possibile nelle mani che hanno realizzato le tavole che stai ammirando, perché un lavoro ben fatto va pagato, perdindirindina! (E perché anche gli artisti devono mangiare!)Quindi, secondo i nostri calcoli, questo è all'incirca come verranno impiegati i fondi:

10% Tariffa Indiegogo e tasse

50% Stampa e spedizione prodotti

40% Team creativo
Speriamo davvero di sì, ma questo non significa necessariamente che tu te lo possa permettere. Abbiamo reso i fumetti disponibili anche in forma digitale, come alternativa più ecologica e più economica, ma se anche questo fosse fuori portata per te, puoi sempre aiutarci condividendo questa campagna con gente che pensi possa essere interessata! Vogliamo portare Brothel Bros al mondo intero, ma le nostre braccia non sono abbastanza lunghe, né i nostri polmoni sono abbastanza potenti, quindi più siamo, meglio è!

... o nel peggiore dei casi possiamo fingere di averne. Ecco le risposte ad alcune domande che potresti avere. Se la tua domanda non è elencata qui, congratulazioni, sei speciale (in senso buono, si spera) e puoi contattarci cliccando su "Ask a question" in alto a destra nella pagina accanto alla faccia diabolicamente sexy di David!
I fumetti sono in Inglese o in Italiano?
Entrambi! Quando richiedi un perk, ti verrà chiesto di scegliere in quale lingua vuoi che sia il fumetto, e questo vale sia per Brothel Bros 1 che per Brothel Bros 2, sia per l'edizione cartacea che per quella digitale. Per il Brothel Bros Backstage Book non ti verrà chiesto di scegliere, perché ogni copia è bilingue (ha entrambe le lingue).
E se io non avessi letto Brothel Bros 1?
Non preoccuparti! Ti suggeriamo di prendere il perk "Both Books" o il perk "Digital Duo" così da avere sia BB1 che BB2! Ma se intendevi prendere alcuni dei prodotti esclusivi del crowfunding, o se intendevi prendere solo il primo libro (Puoi farlo! Tecnicamente BB1 è una storia completa, quindi puoi anche leggere solo quello!) allora clicca qui.
Nota: i perk con "Add-On" nel nome non possono essere richiesti da soli e non se ne può richiedere più di uno per una singola spedizione.
Posso ritirare di persona il perk e non pagare la spedizione?
Se hai richiesto il perk "Brothel Bros 2 - in fiera" ritirerai il perk a Lucca Comics and Games 2018 (ti verranno forniti informazioni e aggiornamenti via e-mail). Se hai richiesto un qualsiasi altro perk e vuoi ritirarlo di persona ti chiediamo di pagare comunque la spedizione (per l'Italia parte da soli 2€), ma di contattarci subito dopo. Se riusciremo, ti daremo il perk di persona (e potresti ottenere qualcosa in più gratuitamente per ricompensarti del disturbo) altrimenti ti avvertiremo per tempo e procederemo comunque con la spedizione.
Che tipo di spedizione è prevista?
Se richiedi un perk che necessita di spedizione, ti verrà chiesto di fornire un indirizzo e ti verrà aggiunto un costo di spedizione dipendente dalla nazione destinataria. Il tuo ordine verrà spedito tramite Poste Italiane usando un pacco normale non tracciabile e non raccomandato (per tenere bassi i costi di spedizione). Per le spedizioni in Italia, per i perk contenenti T-Shirt sarà un "Pacco Ordinario", per tutti gli altri sarà un "Piego di Libri". Se vuoi una Spedizione Raccomandata (che richiederà la tua firma per essere consegnata) clicca qui o contattaci cliccando su "Ask a question"  in alto a destra nella pagina, accanto alla faccia straordinariamente seducente di David!
Nota: i perk i cui nomi contengolo la parola "Extra" non possono essere richiesti da soli e non se ne può richiedere più di uno per una singola spedizione. Indipendentemente dal tipo di spedizione che scegli, noi non saremo responsabili del tuo pacco qualora questo andasse danneggiato o perso durante la spedizione.
In quali taglie e colori sono disponibili le T-Shirt?
Le T-Shirt saranno disponibili in Nero, Grigio, e Bianco, quindi avranno un aspetto simile a questo:

E per sapere quant'è piccola una S, quant'è larga una L, e quant'è... media una M, dai un'occhiata a questa utile tabella! Ti suggeriamo di misurare una maglietta che ti sta comoda e di prendere la taglia che ci si avvicina di più.

Avete una macchina del tempo?
Sfortunatamente no, ma se vi riferite al perk "PROMO PACK" che indica come data di spedizione del perk "novembre 2011", beh... è un errore. E se l'avete ordinato dovreste saperlo. Dovreste saperlo da quasi 7 anni!
 
 
Grazie di aver visitato, contribuito, e condiviso!    

The Story
A year ago, in “Brothel Bros”, the city's 10 worst perverts found out their favourite brothel was actually run by demons. The Administrator, chief of the demons, cast a curse on them, so that if they told someone about their discovery, they'd die. They quite literally had a hell of a night and some of them managed to somewhat cooperate and live to tell the tale (which they didn't, for obvious reasons). [Read the Preview on Tapas, Facebook, Instagram, or Tumblr.]But now, in “Brothel Bros 2 – Plan B”, the peace they fought to defend is threatened. When they all reunite for a wedding ceremony, some really devilish wedding crashers make everything go horribly wrong by sending half of the ceremony guests into another dimensional plane. As they try to get everyone back to their own reality they'll find out there's something way bigger going on...
The Project
Brothel Bros is a comedic thriller comic that uses its wacky absurd premise to tell a funny adrenaline-fueled story, but also to touch upon some deeper psychological topics such as sexual kinks and paedophilia in a bluntly honest way. The first book was positively recieved in Italy and also won two awards at the Italian Indie Comics Award in 2016. Brothel Bros 2 follows in the same footsteps by having an even more adventurous story and delving even deeper into the characters' minds. Brothel Bros has brought people to discuss their inner selves in the past and desires to do it again, because telling compelling stories that stick with you is the best thing we can aim to do.
The BB2 Team

David Malan is the writer and he created Brothel Bros together with Sara Antonellini who also fills the roles of editor and colorist, and as a colorist aide there's Giulia D'Urso. Beatrice Bovo, Silvia Belli, Lisa Picchietti, Connie Daidone, and Giulia Lomurno are in charge of the drawings. Stefano Martinuz and Milena Ciccarello draw and color their own pages. Elisa Serio is in charge of the cover. And in addition to drawing part of BB1, Eleonora Bruni is in charge of the T-Shirts and Mini-Posters designs.
Brothel Bros and Brothel Bros 2 are self-published indie comics distributed in Italian comicbook conventions with the help of non-profit group "Potpourri Comics". With your help we'll be able to complete BB2 and to translate and print both comics in english (BB1 has been translated, BB2 will be shortly).Work in progessBrothel Bros 1 is completely finished and about 65% translated into English, but translating will resume as soon as this campaign is over (it's quite tolling, y'know?). Brothel Bros 2 is completely written and about 50% drawn, but work is proceding steadily and all of us are professionals and worked on similar projects before. So unless demons sprout out of the ground and take us to their dimensional plane (which, granted, Brothel Bros implies it's more likely than it sounds), we will finish the new book within the deadlines we very strictly wrote for ourselves, and all the perks will be then shipped.The ItemsThere's lots of awesome stuff here, and most of it is a crowdfunding exclusive and/or new.
Brothel Bros 1 is the paperback edition and its English version is new. Find out how to get this item by clicking here.

Brothel Bros 2 is the paperback edition and is the comic we're working on right now, so it's extra new!
Mini Poster - Team Ludo/Team Iancu is a small postcard-like poster with a Team Ludo design on one side and a Team Iancu design on the other. It's a crowdfunding exclusive and will be given free with every paperback copy of Brothel Bros 2  as a special thank you to the contributors!

Brothel Bros 1 - File PDF is the digital edition of Brothel Bros 1 and is a crowdfunding exclusive. It contains everything made available in the paperback edition.

Brothel Bros 2 - File PDF is the digital edition of Brothel Bros 2 and is a crowdfunding exclusive. It contains everything made available in the paperback edition.

Brothel Bros Backstage Book is a crowdfunding exclusive booklet containing sketches and character studies from the artists. It also contains some trivia about the creative process and some behind-the-scenes information about the story and characters of Brothel Bros.


Commissione Personalizzata grants you a custom made commission from one of the artists. You get to choose two Brothel Bros characters and the artist you chose will draw them in a full color digital picture just for you!

Brothel Bros 2 T-Shirt is a crowdfunding exclusive T-Shirt with either a Team Iancu or a Team Ludo design on it, your choice! You'll also get to choose its size and color.

[NEW] BodyPillow-Case it's a crowdfunding exclusive and it's a  Dakimakura pillowcase (measuring around 50x150cm). You can choose 2 of the 6 available designs to use as the front and the back of the pillow-case, so you may choose who you'd rather sleep with: Iancu, Shabriri, or Buck.
[NEW] BodyPillow is the pillow you can use the BodyPillow-Case with.Stretch Goals[NEW] We can now announce our stretch goal! If we reach 3500€ all the backers who bought physical Perks will get a Brothel Bros Custom Condom!!! You wanna have a special condom for a special someone? Well, here ya go! Help us reach the Stretch Goal and you'll have it!Show me the moneyThe funds raised in this campaign will be used to pay the printing and shipping of the items and the rest is set to go to the artists whose amazing talents forged this magnificent book. David and Sara, the creators and developers of Brothel Bros, decided not to get a cut of what will be raised here, to instead allow the rest of the creative team to start earning before them. Why do we tell you this? Isn't it their own business what they decide to do? Well, sorta. We want you to know that your contribution will go as directly as possible to pay the hands that made the art that you're seeing, because a good job deserves to be paid, gosh darn it! (And because artists need to eat too!)So, according to our calculations this should approximately be how the funds will be employed:

10% Indiegogo fee and taxes

50% Perks printing and shipping costs

40% Creative team
We really hope you do, but that doesn't necessarily mean you can afford it. We made the comics available in digital form too, as a greener and cheaper alternative, but if that's still too much for you, you can still help us out by sharing this campaign with people who you think might be interested! We want to bring Brothel Bros to the world, but our arms aren't that long and our lungs aren't that powerful, so the more we are spreading the word, the better!

... or at least we'll pretend we do. Here are the answers to some questions you might have. If your question is not listed here, congratulations, you are special (in a good way, we hope) and you can contact us by clicking on "Ask a question" on the top right of the page, next to David's devilishly sexy face!
Are the comics in English or in Italian?
Both! When you claim a perk, you'll be asked to choose what language you want the comic to be in, this goes for both Brothel Bros 1 and Brothel Bros 2, both paperback and digital. For the Brothel Bros Backstage Book you won't be asked to choose, as every copy of it is bilingual (with both languages).
What if I haven't read Brothel Bros 1?
No worries! We suggest getting the perks "Both Books" or "Digital Duo" so that you'll have both BB1 and BB2! But if you wanted to get some of the crowdfunding exclusive items too, or if you wanted to get just the first book (You can do that! Technically BB1 is a complete story, so you can read it on it's own!) then click here.
Note: perks with "Add-On" in their name can't be claimed singularly and you can't claim more than one of them in the same shipping.
Can I collect my perk in person, and not pay for shipping?
If you claimed the perk "Brothel Bros 2 - in fiera" you will collect your perk at Lucca Comics and Games 2018 (instructions and updates will be provided to you via e-mail). If you claimed any other perk and want to collect it in person, we ask you to still pay for shipping, but to contact us afterwards. If we'll be able to, we'll give you the perk in person (and you might get something extra for your trouble) otherwise we'll tell you so beforehand and we'll ship the perk.
What kind of shipping do I get?
If you claim a perk that requires shipping, you'll be asked to fill out your address and a shipping fee will be added depending on the country you're ordering from. Your order will be sent via Poste Italiane (Italy's mail service) using regular non-trackable unregistered packages (to keep your shipping fees low). If you want to get Registered Shipping (which will require your signature to be delivered) click here or contact us by clicking on "Ask a question" on the top right of the page, next to David's amazingly seductive face!
Note: perks with "Extra" in their name can't be claimed singularly and you can't claim more than one of them in the same shipping. Regardless of the shipping option you choose, we will not be responsible for your package being lost or damaged during shipping,
What are the T-Shirts sizes and colors?
The Shirts come in Black, Grey (Charcoal), and White, so they'll look something like this:

And to know how small a small is, how large a large is, and how... medium a medium is, check out this helpful chart! We suggest you measure a T-Shirt you are comfortable in, and then get the closest size.

Do you have a freaking time machine?
Unfortunatley not, but if you're refering to the "PROMO PACK" perk showing "november 2011" as a shipping estimated time, wel... it's a typo. And you should know that, if you ordered it. You should've known that for almost 7 years!
 
Thanks for visiting, contributing, and sharing!

story:
Our beginnings

The Price a Hero Pays! The newest book from A Hero Story. 

  • We went from comic book Instagram to podcasting to now making comics 
  • This is important to us because we believe that we have future careers in the comic industry and that this is our start
  • With your contribution we can truly help get our careers started in making comics

Short Summary 

The Price a Hero Pays is a 2 in 1 story. You get the story of a father and son's battle with illness and you get the story of the hero "Aspire" and his tales from the past. 

How do the perks work? 

  • New to IndieGoGo? No problem. So are we!
  • When you purchase a perk you get all the perks below it included. So with perk 3 you are not paying $16 for a sticker, you are also receiving a physical copy of the book, making the sticker actually just $1 additional

Where does my money go? 

  • With your generous contributions the book is able to get printed
  • It has been a goal of ours for a long time to actually print a comic and now that goal is in tight 
  • The money raised will go to the printing and making of the book. 

Can I donate to the book without getting any perks?

  • You can!
  • Some of you may be waiting for the book to release on comixology, or may just want to help without receiving anything. Just click the "back it" button and you can donate to the campaign

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the breakdwon:

  • We are looking to raise $2000 total. If we go over that would be amazing but we believe that the number is comfortable for our current state and will allow us to create the book at no cost to us
  • The perks! Through our various perks you can not only get the book, you can be in the book! We also have A Hero Story Stickers, and the chance to get original art from Hunter 
  • If we don't reach the goal we still plan to make the book. It may change up how the book is released but we plan to hit our goal. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Whenever fundraising money, there is always the fear that the goal will not be met. We have had these conversations before but we believe in our ability to hit our goal, and maybe even go over our goal
  • The relationship we have always had with followers is that we are willing to work together. If we are to go under the goal we can always work with them and see what we can get done. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you can help get the word out and make some noise about your campaign we would appreciate it

story:
The Frankenstein Zombie

Monday July 24

Welcome back, Frank-Fans! Sorry for the late posting. I got back to the East Coast from Comic-Con late Monday night and my system just crashed. So this is going to be a quick one as I post the last preview images for the Frankenstein Zombie. I will be back soon with more news. Hope you all had a great weekend!

Monday July 17th

Hey, Fear-Fans! It's been an emotional rollercoaster with the death of horror legend George Romero over the weekend. The Master is gone, but his influence will live on. 

And since it's not only Monday, but Monday before Comiccon, let's get to the business of this weeks preview pages. Although, there's more than just interior pages to post as the final version of the cover has just been colored by the uber-talented Arsia Rozegar! Wanted to have this ready for the campaign launch, but here it is in all it's glory. 

So, I've got a lot to do before I shuffle off to San Diego, so let's get to the preview!

Monday, July 10th

Okay, gang! I'm back! Still trying to work the indiegogo interface. Was hoping I could do updates like a blog. Anyway, I'm adding the campaign updates to the basic story here. As promised, for the next 3 Mondays (starting this Monday) I'll be posting preview pages of issue 1 of The Frankenstein Zombie. 

Also! I updated our one-and-only perk to make it help make donating even more enticing.

And finally, I hope to have a little update on the cover next time.

Thank you for your support and I hope you enjoy the preview!

Mahalo! David

 

Greetings! If you've watched my video, some of this will seem familiar, but here goes:  I'd like to talk to you about my new comic book horror series "The Frankenstein Zombie." Imagine the Monster of Frankenstein waking up in a world where he's no longer the scariest thing in the room. A world where Zombies overrun the countryside and the regular folk who would hunt him down with torch and pitchfork now have to beg for his aid. The Frankenstein Zombie, by its very nature, inspires one to new heights of horror, but it also presents an existential crisis as the Monster tries to define his place in this terrifying new world.

Yes, there will be humor. But humor to help alleviate the horror. This is not a spoof or satire . This is a genuine horror series and I really hope to make y'alls skin crawl as the story unfolds.

I'm very excited about this series and want to tell you all about it. And that's the hard part because if I try to tell you about all the good stuff in the series, I will spoil a lot of it.

Just believe me that this is not some arbitrary high-concept pitch. I have very specific reasons for everything in the book. From the locations, to the characters, to the exact dates used in the story. They are all there for a reason. I think the Monster of Frankenstein is one of the best  myth creations in literature and I hope you will support the Frankenstein Zombie.

About Rewards

As you may have heard in the video, I'm not doing a conventional rewards campaign. That's because it's my opinion that rewards are a mechanism to help finance the creation of the book. There's no need for that here. The first issue is completed and ready for the press. So I'm cutting out all the "middlemen", if you will, and getting to the meat of the matter. Like Mad Magazine of old, I'm trying to make this work on unit sales alone.

So, as you see, the price of the donation will get you The Frankenstein Zombie shipped to your door. The donation is $8. You may find that to be an odd number. But this amount will cover the costs of printing, packaging, and shipping. Also, indiegogo will take their piece of that sum. Sales tax will also come into it. As well as the vagaries of international shipping which I can't easily estimate. And there is one other thing most beginning publishers don't count on. A little thing I like to call "hidden costs". While I feel I have crunched all the numbers here, I have learned from experience to always bill in a little cushion for "hidden costs" that didn't come up during negotiations. I don't mind not making a huge profit on this, but I don't want to go into the hole either. Even at $8 I'm cutting it close. I would feel more comfortable pricing this book at $10 in the beginning, but I'm keeping the faith that I've estimated this correctly. After this first campaign is over and I know the true lay of the land, I hope I can adjust the price for issue 2.

And I understand that buying something sight unseen is always a risky proposition. So before this campaign is over, you will be able to preview little over half the first issue. I'm starting off with posting preview pages of the art, but starting each Monday for the next 3 weeks I will post lettered pages so you can preview the story as well as the art. That will be little over half of the first issue.

In the event we don't hit the goal, if we even come close, I intend to fulfill orders. And if we can't come close, every backer will receive a digital copy of the issue.

About Me

There should be a place on this page where you can read my bio, but let me just say I've been a working cartoonist for the past 30 years and have published several titles through my own company as well as working as a freelancer for other comics companies. Maybe I'll post some links if indiegogo is cool with that. I love the core concepts of the classic monsters: Dracula, the Werewolf, the Mummy, and of course, the Frankenstein Monster. I must say that creating this book has been the most satisfying and natural experiences of my career. When I finished a page, I couldn't wait to start the next one. 

And now

Well, I guess that's it. If you think this is interesting, please help spread the word, even if you are not contributing at this time. I'm hoping it's possible for backers to post comments here and we can talk or I can answer questions. If not, check out my facebook page, but I hope we can keep the discussion here.

Well, since I like my work to speak for me, I will leave you with the preview pages I spoke of earlier. 

Thank you for listening. Mahalo!
story_txt:
The Frankenstein Zombie
Monday July 24
Welcome back, Frank-Fans! Sorry for the late posting. I got back to the East Coast from Comic-Con late Monday night and my system just crashed. So this is going to be a quick one as I post the last preview images for the Frankenstein Zombie. I will be back soon with more news. Hope you all had a great weekend!

Monday July 17th
Hey, Fear-Fans! It's been an emotional rollercoaster with the death of horror legend George Romero over the weekend. The Master is gone, but his influence will live on. 
And since it's not only Monday, but Monday before Comiccon, let's get to the business of this weeks preview pages. Although, there's more than just interior pages to post as the final version of the cover has just been colored by the uber-talented Arsia Rozegar! Wanted to have this ready for the campaign launch, but here it is in all it's glory. 
So, I've got a lot to do before I shuffle off to San Diego, so let's get to the preview!

Monday, July 10th
Okay, gang! I'm back! Still trying to work the indiegogo interface. Was hoping I could do updates like a blog. Anyway, I'm adding the campaign updates to the basic story here. As promised, for the next 3 Mondays (starting this Monday) I'll be posting preview pages of issue 1 of The Frankenstein Zombie. 
Also! I updated our one-and-only perk to make it help make donating even more enticing.
And finally, I hope to have a little update on the cover next time.
Thank you for your support and I hope you enjoy the preview!
Mahalo! David

 
Greetings! If you've watched my video, some of this will seem familiar, but here goes:  I'd like to talk to you about my new comic book horror series "The Frankenstein Zombie." Imagine the Monster of Frankenstein waking up in a world where he's no longer the scariest thing in the room. A world where Zombies overrun the countryside and the regular folk who would hunt him down with torch and pitchfork now have to beg for his aid. The Frankenstein Zombie, by its very nature, inspires one to new heights of horror, but it also presents an existential crisis as the Monster tries to define his place in this terrifying new world.
Yes, there will be humor. But humor to help alleviate the horror. This is not a spoof or satire . This is a genuine horror series and I really hope to make y'alls skin crawl as the story unfolds.
I'm very excited about this series and want to tell you all about it. And that's the hard part because if I try to tell you about all the good stuff in the series, I will spoil a lot of it.
Just believe me that this is not some arbitrary high-concept pitch. I have very specific reasons for everything in the book. From the locations, to the characters, to the exact dates used in the story. They are all there for a reason. I think the Monster of Frankenstein is one of the best  myth creations in literature and I hope you will support the Frankenstein Zombie.
About Rewards
As you may have heard in the video, I'm not doing a conventional rewards campaign. That's because it's my opinion that rewards are a mechanism to help finance the creation of the book. There's no need for that here. The first issue is completed and ready for the press. So I'm cutting out all the "middlemen", if you will, and getting to the meat of the matter. Like Mad Magazine of old, I'm trying to make this work on unit sales alone.
So, as you see, the price of the donation will get you The Frankenstein Zombie shipped to your door. The donation is $8. You may find that to be an odd number. But this amount will cover the costs of printing, packaging, and shipping. Also, indiegogo will take their piece of that sum. Sales tax will also come into it. As well as the vagaries of international shipping which I can't easily estimate. And there is one other thing most beginning publishers don't count on. A little thing I like to call "hidden costs". While I feel I have crunched all the numbers here, I have learned from experience to always bill in a little cushion for "hidden costs" that didn't come up during negotiations. I don't mind not making a huge profit on this, but I don't want to go into the hole either. Even at $8 I'm cutting it close. I would feel more comfortable pricing this book at $10 in the beginning, but I'm keeping the faith that I've estimated this correctly. After this first campaign is over and I know the true lay of the land, I hope I can adjust the price for issue 2.
And I understand that buying something sight unseen is always a risky proposition. So before this campaign is over, you will be able to preview little over half the first issue. I'm starting off with posting preview pages of the art, but starting each Monday for the next 3 weeks I will post lettered pages so you can preview the story as well as the art. That will be little over half of the first issue.
In the event we don't hit the goal, if we even come close, I intend to fulfill orders. And if we can't come close, every backer will receive a digital copy of the issue.
About Me
There should be a place on this page where you can read my bio, but let me just say I've been a working cartoonist for the past 30 years and have published several titles through my own company as well as working as a freelancer for other comics companies. Maybe I'll post some links if indiegogo is cool with that. I love the core concepts of the classic monsters: Dracula, the Werewolf, the Mummy, and of course, the Frankenstein Monster. I must say that creating this book has been the most satisfying and natural experiences of my career. When I finished a page, I couldn't wait to start the next one. 

And now
Well, I guess that's it. If you think this is interesting, please help spread the word, even if you are not contributing at this time. I'm hoping it's possible for backers to post comments here and we can talk or I can answer questions. If not, check out my facebook page, but I hope we can keep the discussion here.
Well, since I like my work to speak for me, I will leave you with the preview pages I spoke of earlier. 
Thank you for listening. Mahalo!

story:
Who Am I...and What Am I Doing?

Hello, my name is Lawrence Ross, and I'm a writer based on Los Angeles. I've written six books, including the best sellers The Divine Nine: The History of African American Fraternities and Sororities, and Blackballed: The Black and White Politics of Race on America's Campuses. I've been a managing editor, newspaper reporter, magazine journalist, screenwriter, and NOW, a comic book writer/creator. 
My creative philosophy is that a great idea not executed is a great idea wasted. So after having done extensive research, I decided that turning The Casuals into a comic book series would be a fantastic way to tell a new story. A story where underrepresented women were the heroes of the story, and they did it in a way that was authentic. 
Your contribution to this Indiegogo campaign is HUGE. Comic book production isn't simply about writing a story and then hiring an artist. Oh no, I learned that quickly!  Your contribution literally helps put The Casuals on the page, and into the hands of comic book lovers. 

What We Need & What You Get

I'm trying to raise funds for every aspect of the production of The Casuals, while also having enough comic books on hand to sell via Amazon.com and at various comic book conventions. To create a comic book, it's MUCH more complicated than you'd think. You have an illustrator, colorist, letterer, and then you have to have the comic printed. Each point of production has costs, and this fundraiser helps with them.
But don't worry, I'm gonna give you SWAG for helping me reach my dream! Not only do you have an opportunity to be one of the first to get a first issue of The Casuals, but you'll also have an opportunity to get The Casuals FIRST! So check out the incentives!

The Impact

So why support The Casuals, and why now? For one, we live in a world where content is king, and the traditional barriers that once prevented diversity are now falling. The Casuals is both a unique and entertaining story, and it features the women who are often overlooked as the heroes. This isn't just a great story for girls and women, but for EVERYONE . 
This is a passion project, and whatever I have a passion for, I go all in. But to do this, I'm going to need your help...or else I'm gonna be stuck with a bunch of unread comic books in my home...and the wife won't like that! So make sure to contribute today!

Other Ways You Can Help

As we closer to production, I'm going to need MANY people to spread the word about The Casuals. So let me know where you can help!
And whatever you do, PLEASE SHARE THIS ON ALL OF YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA NETWORKS!!

story: ..

For those who missed the campaign...

Here's the postcards for sale.


My Story

Back in the day (in October 2010) I started making a webcomic about the various weird and wonderful events that happen in my somewhat polyamorous life. I called it Poly in Pictures, and didn't realise until many weeks later how appropriate the name was, because I'm a bit dense sometimes. Somehow, with very little poking of the intertubes, I gained a few followers and sold a few home-printed books. Now I'm at around 1,000 hits per day, and I've published over 100 little (and sometimes bigger) comic strips.

I had so much fun making Moo cards of the comics to hand out at conventions, but I never made it to the conventions. Some friends suggested making postcards and greetings cards...

And here I am.


The Impact

It just tickles me that my comics might end up on someone's doormat with a stamp and a postmark on it. Some of the comics will have empty speech bubbles, so that people can fill them in with their own weird and wonderful stories. You can see them all if you click "Gallery" oop there: ^^

If you all donate enough, the comics will break out of the internet and bleed into real life.


What I Need & What You Get

The postcards will be printed with an indie, co-op-run eco printer, so minimal impact on the environment. I got a quote for 5 different designs, 50 of each, and they told me it'd be around £70.

I need some new pens and a decent camera. The one I have is pretty good, but the buttons have all fallen off and it eats batteries. I'd really like to upgrade to something like this for £140.

And finally, I need to get some more business cards printed. I had 100 Moo cards with lots of different comics on, and they ran out a lot faster than I thought they would. I want to get another 200 printed up, better designs and with some of the newer comics on them. Each card is a mini comic on its own!

What do you get? Better quality comics posted on the site. Some excellent postcards to send to people when you want to make someone smile. Some leetle comics on business cards to keep in your wallet and chuckle at occasionally, or to explain polyamorous concepts to randomers.


Other Ways You Can Help

The best thing you can do aside from (and arguably better than) donating is spreading the word. Tweet this link, but with a little description to let people know what you think of it. Chuck it on Facebook, and tell your friends from high school that you want to get postcards from them. Just, y'know, splash it about indiscriminately. Nice one.

story:
bRudeNoMo® is a comedy short film, presented like a PSA (Public Service Announcement) about fictional smartphone application of the same name, that gives rude public cell phone users a reminder that they need to be more polite.

We all appreciate and depend on modern technology, but it is truly amazing at how it has begun to affect people's behavior. Kids constantly texting day and night; How much can you possibly have to say? Adults taking cell phone calls in public settings, talking loudly without regard to those around. And of course how many lives have been affected by someone texting or talking while behind the wheel of a car!


The Premise

Concerned citizen Bric S. Haus (Sean Michael Beyer) wants nothing more than to cure those afflicted with "Smartphone-Oriented Social Attitude Degradation" or "SoSad." He solicits the services of computer genius Dr. Felix Johnston (Zach Cumer, best known as the hilarious hyper martial arts kid in the movie Smokin' Aces) who has created the bRudeNoMo smartphone app that gives the SoSad victim a "zap" by whomever happens to have installed Dr. Johnston's app (a detailed synopsis is available via email upon request info@eyescreamfilms.com).


With our over-the-top humorous approach (think an SNL Digital short meets Monty Python), we want to provide a fun and entertaining public service announcement, yet at the same time shed some light on the inconsiderate behavior, many of us are guilty of. Our goal is for this project to go viral and in doing so, hopefully help people realize that they don't have to be a slave to their technology and remember how nice actual face-to-face human interaction can be.


We could certainly approach this from a serious standpoint, as this is a serious subject. But it's a proven fact that humor can be far more effective at getting across a point, especially with the younger generation. No one likes to be preached or talked down to, but everyone enjoys a good laugh.


What were gonna do with the funds raised

We have budgeted $7,250 to make this happen. Production will be in the Los Angeles area, taking advantage of the wealth of local talent, in front of and behind the camera. A small portion of this will go to flying co-writer Adam Carbone from Rhode Island to LA to work on and appear in the project. Adam is a hard-working and aspiring filmmaker and might not have a chance for this kind of experience for quite some time. Gotta support the arts, right?

We plan to take advantage of the Screen Actors Guild New Media agreement, which allows us to use experienced professional actors, but at a very reasonable rate. And should this get the attention of say a cable network or the likes there of, with our SAG agreement we can easily upgrade to a TV contract, paying the actors more, but not affecting our budget. A win-win for all involved. We, including all of you contributors, get greater exposure, spreading our message to the masses!

If it happens that we don't meet our fund-raising goal, we can do a slimmed down version of this project (depending on how much is raised) OR the funds raised can be applied to one of many other projects the team members have going. Suffice to say, the money will not go to waste! AND we will let each and every contributor know what's going on each step of the way.

What's In It For You?

Besides our hearty thanks, we have a variety of fun perks for you generous contributors. At any level you get screen and IMDb credit. Producer / Director Sean Michael Beyer will be giving away autographed copies of his book "Hometown Police Blotter" a hilarious collection of real-life 911 calls brought to life with illustration (www.HometownPoliceBlotter.com). Those of you VIP contributors get characters named after you or a friend and Executive Producers get a walk-on role here in the LA area, or a product or similar prominently featured in the project.

Help Spread The Word

Exposure is the key. Please tell your friends and whomever you think might think this project is pretty cool. You can share this on Facebook, Twitter, etc. Sending an email to friends and colleagues is a good thing too.


Let's make this happen, have a few laughs and maybe, just maybe get a few folks to put down their phones for a few minutes and enjoy the finer things in life! 

-Sean Michael Beyer and the bRudeNoMo Team

-Sean Michael Beyer and the bRudeNoMo Team
campaign_city: Los Angeles (in and around), United States

story:
Our Story

Comic Book Ink is a full service comic book store located right next door to the Lakewood Regal Cinemas in Tacoma, WA. Just a hop skip and a jump from Fort Lewis and Puyallup. Established in October of 2002 by local Actor/Director John Munn, they provide the best in customer service, subscription programs and new, and old, comic book and movie merchandise!

In the last nine years they have been lucky enough to have such creators as artist Adam Kubert, multiple Eisner Award Winner Brian Michael Bendis, Tim Sale, Daniel Way, Clayton Crain, Robert Kirkman, Ed Brubaker, Michael Lark, Stephano Gaudiano, Eric S. Trautmann, Phil & Kaja Foglio, Roberta Gregory, Moritat, Brandon Graham, Joshua Ortega, James Stokoe, Todd Herrman, Carolyn Main, Walter O'Neal, Scott Allie and John Layman...They're always hoping to have more folks visit them as well, both famous (and a little infamous).

When they moved from East 72nd to their new home, at the Lakewood Regal Cinemas Complex, they knew they would succeed, but were $110,000.00 in debt. This was August 1, 2010.

John knew the shop could do it. Through the help of benefactors, he had been able to juggle bills for eight years...including the huge drop in October of 2008. John had juggled as hard as he could up to that point and he just couldn't juggle anymore. The economy was not recovering as fast as they needed, he was trying to help his father as he battled with health issues, his wife was no longer employed ...there were a number of things that were draining his finances and he could no longer put them into the shop.

They were $30,000.00 away from not being able to stay open 2 months ago after a lot of hard work on the part of John, his staff and many of Comic Book Ink's customers and benefactors to reduce the debt.

in the last two months and three weeks, they have reduced that debt from $30,000.00 to $4,500.00 which, ironically, is the cost of this week's shipment of new comics, and back debt payment to Diamond Comics (who have also been phenomenal and helped them greatly). This week's invoice is $4,529.74.

About the staff. The store succeeds, and is what it is, because of them. The core group of their "Customer Family" know Alex, Josh & Carmen...and they are the reason that these folks come to the store. And it should be noted that the overall clientele is an eclectic mix of artists, filmmakers, actors, designers, mechanics, basically people from all walks of life.

John's father ended his battle with a deadly disease on August 10th, 2011 at 7:12pm. John is working through the process, with his two brothers, of settling his father's affairs and putting the life he left behind into order.

The Impact

This campaign will ensure that a 7-time Eisner Award Nominated Comic Book Store keeps their doors open. Hundreds of comic book readers, artists, writers and collectors frequent Comic Book Ink on a monthly basis. The loss of one of the true Pop Culture treasures to the Tacoma-Seattle area would be detrimental to the community and to John and his family. Comic Book Ink will close if it is unable to raise this final $4500.


What We Need & What You Get


Comic Book Ink needs a minimum of $4500 to be finally caught up and continue their efforts to bring great pop culture entertainment to the Tacoma area and beyond. These funds will go to pay off what is owed to Diamond Comic Distributors, ensuring that new product is available for purchase by the regular clientele. For a contribution of $25, you get a $25 gift certificate to purchase merchandise with. For a contribution of $100, you get a $50 gift certificate and a graphic novel or trade paperback of your choice. For a contribution of $1000 or more you get a VIP pass which gives you a $100 gift certificate, a graphic novel or trade paperback of your choice and a private party with the staff of Comic Book Ink and some Guest Artists (Comic Book Writers, Artists, Actors, Filmmakers and more!) from the NW!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word via our share tools and your resources and contacts, and help us keep Comic Book Ink open for years to come. You can also help by just visiting the store and making a purchase. Support local, independent businesses!

The economy was not recovering as fast as they needed, he was trying to help his father as he battled with health issues, his wife was no longer 
employed ...there were a number of things that were draining his finances
 and he could no longer put them into the shop.They were $30,000.00 away from not being able to stay open 2 months ago after a lot of hard work on the part of John, his staff and many of Comic Book Ink's customers and benefactors to reduce the debt.in the last two months and 
three weeks, they have reduced that debt from $30,000.00 to $4,500.00 
which, ironically, is the cost of this week's shipment of new comics, and back debt 
payment to Diamond Comics (who have also been phenomenal and helped them
greatly).  This week's invoice is $4,529.74.About the staff.  The store succeeds, and is what it is, 
because of them.  The core group of their "Customer Family" know Alex, 
Josh & Carmen...and they are the reason that these folks come to the 
store. And it should be noted that the overall clientele is an eclectic mix of artists, filmmakers, actors, designers, mechanics, basically people from all walks of life.John's father ended his battle with a deadly disease on August 10th, 2011 
at 7:12pm. John is working through the process, with his two brothers, of 
settling his father's affairs and putting the life he left behind into order. 

The Impact
This campaign will ensure that a 7-time Eisner Award Nominated Comic Book Store keeps their doors open. Hundreds of comic book readers, artists, writers and collectors frequent Comic Book Ink on a monthly basis. The loss of one of the true Pop Culture treasures to the Tacoma-Seattle area would be detrimental to the community and to John and his family. Comic Book Ink will close if it is unable to raise this final $4500.

What We Need & What You Get


Comic Book Ink needs a minimum of $4500 to be finally caught up and continue their efforts to bring great pop culture entertainment to the Tacoma area and beyond. These funds will go to pay off what is owed to Diamond Comic Distributors, ensuring that new product is available for purchase by the regular clientele. For a contribution of $25, you get a $25 gift certificate to purchase merchandise with. For a contribution of $100, you get a $50 gift certificate and a graphic novel or trade paperback of your choice. For a contribution of $1000 or more you get a VIP pass which gives you a $100 gift certificate, a graphic novel or trade paperback of your choice and a private party with the staff of Comic Book Ink and some Guest Artists (Comic Book Writers, Artists, Actors, Filmmakers and more!) from the NW!


Other Ways You Can Help
Please spread the word via our share tools and your resources and contacts, and help us keep Comic Book Ink open for years to come. You can also help by just visiting the store and making a purchase. Support local, independent businesses!

story:
Our Mission

Our mission is to put every adult human being (and some animals with concerned owners) into the proper protective gear to prevent Alien, Government, or Illuminati mind probes.   You've seen public acknowledgment of the Illuminati by Weird Al and such public figures such as Jimmie Kimmel and Jim Carry with the "All Mocking Tongue".      The Tin Foil Hat is proven technology which has been kept secret by the underground cabals  and alien invaders in an attempt to minimize the impact to their Anal Probe schedule.    Now some would claim there is absolutely nothing factual to the value of Tin Foil Hats and they prevent nothing, have no basic benefit and really present nothing positive other than increasing the mount of sales of aluminum kitchen product.   They are likely right, but who knows they could also be infiltrators sent to misdirect our efforts.    So we remain vigilant in our duty to ourselves and our friends, and we say build those hats!   Dawn your tin and let none in!

  • We are a small group of individuals who build things.  We make complex designs and are what the internet has termed as "Makers".   We have no real claim on the Illuminati or any conspiracy theories and don't really even believe in the validity or use of tin foil hats, but we do like money.   Plus we are somewhat bored and are fairly good at working with tin foil so as such we figured "What the hell!   Lets give this a shot."    Support your Makers, send us lots of money and you may even end up with a cool new hat in the process.
  • This campaign can be summed up best by the phrase "If its on the internet, its gotta be real, right?"    Is it comedy?   Is it ingenuity?   Or is it really some deep dark secret with arms and tentacles (that's tentacles not testicles) in all parts of society.   Tin Foil Hats have been around for some time now, we certainly did not invent them nor do we put any claim to such.   We do not regularly wear them except at parties perhaps.   But we will sell them to you, and we will show you a bunch of reasons which are plainly searchable on the internet for wearing them.    And remember, its a worthy cause, no sea-turtles were harmed in the making of this project.
  • By contributing to this project you will ensure that we are happy.    After all everyone seeks happiness.   You will contribute to perhaps future projects by the team of makers which have brought you these really cool tin foil hats.   But most of all you will contribute yet another silly paranoia driven fad which is sweeping the internet.   After all, what fun is it if you can't contribute to the madness!   

You've read all about it, now its time to join madness and make your contribution! 

What We Need & What You Get

As you've managed to drag yourself through all the malarkey and are still reading this, we can suppose that you are a serious die hard and know the value of a good hand-made Faraday chapeau!    So read on my friend!   Read on!   And join the excitement which is "TIN FOIL HATS":

  • So as you can see by the funding, we're not satisfied with just a few bucks.  We we need about $50,000 before we are really happy.   Once we make it to that point we will know that the world is in fact going to hell in a hand-basket. But at least we're hanging on the same ride with the rest of the world.
  • By becoming a contributor you will of course receive our undying gratitude for making us just a bit more wealthy.   But as an upper end contributor you will also receive a hand made personal thought protection devices (tin foil hat) for yourself, and perhaps for your loving pet.   Because we all know that Fido does not want any damn aliens knowing where he buries his goodies!
  • If we do not reach our goal, the funds still remain with us; however, we can sleep better at night knowing that at least the entire internet hasn't gone crazy and there are still a few sane people out there who chose to purchase a good dinner rather than contributing to a tin foil hat project on the internet.
Levels of Contribution
  • You cheap B@#@%d! - $1
  • Entry Level Contribution - $10
  • Honorable Mention - $15
  • Do it yourself Tin Foil Hat - $20
  • Basic Tin Foil Hat - $30
  • Me and my Pet - $40
  • The Whole Family - $100
  • I Love you guys! - $250
  • I'm Nuts - $1000
The Impact

Now I know many of you are wondering one of two things.   Either "Why on earth would I contribute to something so silly and cockamamie!"  or "Oh my god how brilliant, why hasn't anyone been selling these things before!".    Let me address the first contingent first.   Because although the "cause" may be feeble, whacked out, and completely satirical; the builders and "Makers" behind it are not.   We actually do build and design some really cool electronic devices and could always use the funding to help fund such a conceptually spirited bunch.    So by donating you don't only  get the metallic gear, but you also help to fund future "Real" projects.    To address the second contingent, well I've got nothin'.   The best I can say is that you are likely one of God's special little children, and I'm glad we could contribute to your purpose in life.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you just don't have the money but would like to contribute to the project, you can do so by simply getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
  • Always remember use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
