story:
Check out our first issue, Vol 1.1: Fire 

www.tenththrone.com

 

Short Summary

My name in Sandy Comstock, and I am an aspiring television writer. You’re probably wondering how I got here, on Indiegogo, pushing an online graphic novel. All I can say is that it literally fell into my lap. I had just finished writing an original series for television and wanted to have a few pieces of concept art drawn up to showcase the tone of the show. A mutual friend referred me to Zach Brown, an award winning speed sketch artist, and I sent him my script. Neither of us knew that fateful first meeting would give way to a much larger project. He teamed up with Sophie, an actress and colorist, to complete the vision. When I received the first piece of art, I was floored. The mythical, magical word I created was perfectly captured. It was like they picked the image directly out of my brain. I knew then that we had something amazing. From there, we decided to embark on our very first graphic novel! So, here we are.

 

THE STORY

On the planet Rutas, the mythical lands of Atlantis, Lemuria, Shangri-La, and Shambala continue to thrive. There are many communities and civilizations on this world, and I want to give each a voice. Rutas is a convergence of different pantheons and ideologies co-existing as one.

Currently, the people are experiencing an Age of Light, a prosperous, peaceful and harmonious time. But all that comes to a jarring halt when the 10th Kingdom of Atlantis is destroyed. Inexperienced and unprepared for this tragedy, the world is thrown into turmoil and forced to navigate unfamiliar terrain.

WHAT WE’RE TRYING TO ACHIEVE

This idea is a labor of love for me. I spent years researching and many more compiling the whole story – 10 years in all. It is so exciting to finally see it come to life. My goal is to consistently publish one issue online a month. Book 1 will consist of 8 or 9 issues and depict different character perspectives all circling around the same event: The attack on the 10th Kingdom.

I want each character’s story to be seemingly separate from the next. Eventually, their fates will intertwine, as they fulfill their destinies. One of the main characters we follow is Branka, a mystic from the 6th Kingdom of Atlantis. She finds herself in the the center of the attack and is forced to use her magic to defend herself. After her narrow escape, she discovers that the 10th Kingom has fallen and she is the only survivor. Her role solidified, she is determined to find justice for those behind the attack. 

WHAT WE NEED, WHAT YOU GET

In order to consistently put out issues, I am asking for $6,000. After Indiegogo and PayPal take their cut, this will leave me with enough to compensate Zach and Sophie, my two amazing artists, for their dedication and work on Volume 1.1, as well as their current efforts on Volumes 1.2 and 1.3. Your contributions will also help maintain the website and hosting and cover any production and shipping costs for hard copies.

Every little bit helps, and I greatly appreciate your generosity.

In exchange for your support, you'll be able to choose between some small rewards and some really fantastic packages. Check out the list on the right, and pick your favorite!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you’re unable to contribute, you can still help out immensely by spreading the word about this campaign. Share it on Facebook or Twitter.

story:
Join Oswald on his adventures with his new comic book series which starts right from the beginning of his life with "My First Day" and then leads into "Passing Queens and Making Homes."

 The story that began it all is now available for the first time as a limited edition standard comic book 'My First Day'

Each book will be limited to 250 copies and will be signed and numbered.

We're also offering an alternate cover that is limited to 500 pieces illustrated by Donny Hadiwidjaja and colored by Carlos Alberto Moreno

We are also offering virgin covers to this series. What that means is that the covers will be printed without any logos or text on them, so the art will not be obscured.

As another perk we're offering a limited amount of sketch covers illustrated by the awesome Daphne Lage :D

All proceeds from this IndieGoGo will be to continue the ever expanding adventure of Oswald and his many friends. So thank you and please help yourself to a few books :D

The series is written by JD Calderon and is illustrated by Jade Gonzalez

MY FIRST DAY

"Oswald, a mouse different from the rest of his kind in that he can speak and think rationally, befriends a young girl named Sally, who teaches him how to read. Sally, unfortunately, is dying from a mysterious malady, the source of which only Oswald discovers: a group of goblins feeding on the girl’s life force. Can a lone mouse—even one as intelligent as Oswald—put an end to the rapacious thirst of such monsters?"

Original cover by Jade Gonzalez with colors by David Montoya

Alternative cover by: Donny Hadiwidjaja with colors by Carlos Alberto Moreno

And continuing the Oswald saga is: 

PASSING QUEENS AND MAKING HOMES

"After his battle with the goblins troubling Sally, Oswald wanders the streets of New York and bumps into Alicia and her brother Jones—two young kobolds who are doing their best to avoid capture by a group of orks led by their double-dealing leader, Gilem. Gilem and his orks manage to capture the two fleeing siblings, but not before Oswald is given a secret treasure by the children: a gem of great mystical might that Oswald can somehow manipulate to suit his needs. Trinket in paw, he sets off in pursuit of the children to prevent the orks that captured them for their queen from claiming the bounty offered for their return."   

Original cover by Jade Gonzalez

Alternative cover by: Donny Hadiwidjaja with colors by Carlos Alberto Moreno

Original cover by Jade Gonzalez

Alternative cover by: Donny Hadiwidjaja with colors by Carlos Alberto Moreno

 

There are very few risks and challenges since the stories are complete and ready to go to press :D

The only level where there will be a delay is the Sketchcover level. Each sketchcover is individually hand drawn and colored by Daphne Lage and usually ships about 2 weeks after the initial orders.

If you like what you see and want to help out please share on social media and please spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools :)

story:
The main cover for Word Smith is done P.R. Dedelis who does all the interiors. The variant cover for Word Smith - Fear & Honour is provided by Michael Shelfer. His most famous and recognised works are on the X-Men series DOMINO from Marvel. He has also illustrated for IMAGE and TokyoPop. Colours by Peyton Freeman.

NOTE : The cover images are currently mock ups. The final design may be different.

Word Smith - Fear and Honour is a steampunk fantasy adventure where words come to life. A skilled artisan can craft words to evoke feelings and emotions from its recipients. Although not all words mean the same thing to everyone! Victoria and her friends find themselves facing off a mysterious stranger! Through this volume, Victoria will learn the true meaning of honour. There's adventure, excitement and of course, lots of words.

 

IMPORTANT :

Word Smith - Fear and Honour is the third volume in the series. The digital PDF copy of Volume 1 and 2 are included in ALL reward tiers.  There is a reward tier if you want a physical copy of all 3 volumes.

 

The story picks up directly from the exciting cliff-hanger of Volume 2! After Dimitri and Sparky failed to stop the mysterious stranger, is Mei-Li and Alastair up to the task?

Of course, what would a volume of Word Smith be without some magical words!

There's also some evil plans afoot for Victoria's word smithing skills! What will happen to our Victoria and the rest of the gang? What are the General's plans? I've good so much to share in this volume of the story!

You'll ALSO get a glimpse into the past where you watch Victoria learn how to become a word smith. Ever wanted to learn the secret behind the words? More importantly you get to see BABY SPARKY!

Available with the Indiegogo with PDF copies of Word Smith 3 and physical copies of the book! List of the available rewards are here :

  • PDF Pack of Word Smith 1, 2, 3 and MORE
  • Print Copy of the Main Cover and Trading Card
  • A5 Print
  • Print Copy of the Variant Cover
  • Print Copy of Volume 1 & 2

PDF Pack

The PDF pack consists of Word Smith Volume 1, 2 & 3 and MORE! As different stretch goals are reached, more digital rewards included HIGH resolution artwork, PDF from other creators will be added to this pack.

 

Print Copy of Word Smith (MAIN / VARIANT) and Trading Card

There are 2 versions of the printed version of Word Smith. You get to pick between the MAIN cover and the VARIANT cover. Can't decide? Get both!

All copies of the MAIN COVER will come with this exclusive Word Smith trading card of our heroes Victoria & Sparky! 

NOTE : The card design is currently a mock up. The final design may be different.

A5 Print

Get a limited edition A5 print (approx. 5.85" x 8.25") of all the main characters from the Word Smith universe! The print was amazing and involved over 4 different creatives to bring it to life.

More?

All backers will receive the below 2 high resolution images for FREE from Jae Sung Kim! All physical backers will also receive A5 prints of both images for FREE!

Risks & Challenges

I have run and fulfiled multiple IndieGoGo campaigns and they have all been delivered. I do hope you can help spread the word about Word Smith (pun intended).

Thank you so much for checking out my campaign!
story_txt:
The main cover for Word Smith is done P.R. Dedelis who does all the interiors. The variant cover for Word Smith - Fear & Honour is provided by Michael Shelfer. His most famous and recognised works are on the X-Men series DOMINO from Marvel. He has also illustrated for IMAGE and TokyoPop. Colours by Peyton Freeman.

NOTE : The cover images are currently mock ups. The final design may be different.
Word Smith - Fear and Honour is a steampunk fantasy adventure where words come to life. A skilled artisan can craft words to evoke feelings and emotions from its recipients. Although not all words mean the same thing to everyone! Victoria and her friends find themselves facing off a mysterious stranger! Through this volume, Victoria will learn the true meaning of honour. There's adventure, excitement and of course, lots of words. IMPORTANT :

story:
Our Time in Eden, Chapter Three

Two lives, broken and cast out of paradise, spiral toward each other. Ellis, a lost and fading mystery, returns home in search of her childhood friend Tim, a reclusive drunk dodging any touch of the world around him. This is not a love story.

In this third chapter in the series, with the world outside threatening to find them, Tim and Ellis sink again into their past, floating through an age of adolescence under a looming adulthood, and the struggle to keep their childhood friendship strong.

A remembered promise and an impossible choice brings their younger selves to a turning point, a chance to undo their regrets, and travel the road behind them differently. Memories are blurred blind in this third chapter of Our Time in Eden, the fictions and facts transpose, leaving these two souls truly LOST.

From author Gibson Twist and artist Ben Steeves, Our Time in Eden is a story of lost innocence, lost direction, and lost hope. The promises and lies of childhood, the endurance and heartbreak of friendship, and the bitter consequence of tasting the fruit of knowledge.

Here we are seeking funds to print the third chapter in this engrossing and deeply-emotional comic series.


What's On Offer?

This is a simple campaign, free of bells and whistles. We're offering comics, copies of this 30-page black and white comic for $6 USD in the US and Canada, $8 USD for international backers. In addition, for those who missed our campaigns for Chapters One and Two, we're offering packages with all three issues, Ch 1, Fatigue, Ch 2, Innocence, and ch 3. Lost for $16 USD in the US and Canada, and $22 USD for international backers. We're also offering Retailer packages, so bug your local comic shop to come on out to the party.

The comic is ready to print, we're just waiting for funds to skyrocket into the universe! Backers of the second chapter will receive a unique bookplate reserved only for backers of this IndieGogo campaign.


The Story of The Story

Our Time in Eden began as a novel, written by Gibson Twist in 1995, then languished for many years. Gibson met Ben Steeves in 2005 at a local comic-making event, teaming up in 2006 to win cash and prizes in a collaborative comicking marathon, About Comics' Comic Jam War. A unique artistic connection formed quickly between them, and they began discussing a larger project. Ben chose Our Time in Eden.

The project was first posted online at ourtimeineden.smackjeeves.com in 2008, gaining critical acclaim and small, devoted audience. Ben and Gibson are now bringing the series to print, continuing with this third chapter, LOST.

More of Ben's work can be found at zombenstrikes.com and Gibson's long-running comic Pictures of You can be found at picturesofyoucomic.com
